item.description: For several months now, a group of rogues have held King's Watch in their clutches, terrorizing the populace, opposed only by a handful of heroes. Now that their power has broken, the people of the city can rest easy... or can they? These black-hearted villains did not act alone, and now their associates and surviving henchmen are making a grab at power. Will you join the exhausted defenders of King's Watch in the final push against tyranny? Come join us in this two-hour-long sword-swinging adventure designed for ages 10+. Fight the villains, protect the innocent, save the day!
item.name: Adventure Night: Loose Ends
